content: Invest in Stocks, Mutual Funds, IPOs, and more. Open your FREE Demat account today and start your journey to financial freedom.
Mutual funds are smart instruments for diversifying and building wealth over the long term. We offer Equity, Debt, Hybrid, ETFs, Tax Saving Funds (ELSS), and NFOs.
Explore and invest in companies listing on the stock market for the first time. View open, upcoming, and closed IPOs.

Integrated Services is a leading provider of facility management, security, and business support solutions in India. Our journey is built on a foundation of trust, integrity, and a relentless commitment to client satisfaction.
You can reach us for any inquiries. Our office is located at 5A, 5th Floor, Kences Towers, 1, Ramakrishna Street, T. Nagar, Chennai - 600 017. Email us at customercare@integratedindia.in.
Find answers to our most common inquiries. We have FAQs for Equity, Demat, NPS, Insurance, and more.
